thread.title: General influence of Westerly winds across Nepal, snowfall in high mountainous areas
thread.title_full: General influence of Westerly winds across Nepal, snowfall in high mountainous areas

author: Republica
title: General influence of Westerly winds across Nepal, snowfall in high mountainous areas
text: Published On: December 31, 2023 11:00 AM NPT By: [Republica](/news/author/880) | @RepublicaNepal KATHMANDU, Dec 31: The influence of the Westerly winds is anticipated to have a widespread impact across the country today, as reported by the Meteorological Forecasting Division (MFD). Currently, Sudurpaschim, Karnali, and Lumbini provinces are experiencing partly cloudy conditions, while the rest of the country is generally clear. Additionally, low-lying areas are affected by fog. As of now, Sudurpaschim, Karnali, and Lumbini provinces are enjoying generally clear weather, contrasting with the partly cloudy conditions prevalent in the remaining parts of the country. Terai places are also experiencing foggy conditions. The MFD forecasts partial to normal rainfall in the hilly areas later this afternoon, while the weather is expected to remain generally clear in other regions. Furthermore, there is a likelihood of light snowfall in select locations within the high hills and mountainous areas. Tonight, the weather is projected to be clear in most areas, with partial to normal changes expected over the hilly areas. There is a possibility of light snowfall at one or two locations in the high hilly and mountainous areas of Gandaki and Koshi provinces.
